title: Ticket #2849: schedd should explicitly ask for partitionable resources
description:
Right now the startd looks up attributes provided by the user (e.g. requestmemory) in the job classad to figure out partitionable resources such as memory, cpus, disk.

When claiming a partitionable slot, the schedd should send explicit attributes along with the claim request to identify the magnitude for these partitionable resources. If these explicit attributes are not defined, the startd can fall back to the old behavior.

requirement: default is in the param table.
